data.text: @GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay What’s surprising is that @UCSF doesn’t seem like I care that he is a master of misinformation and could be jeopardizing the health of kids.

@GYamey @babydocAnita @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay How about this physician? Was he blocked. Y'all will figure out the truth one day ... maybe ... okay you probably won't. 🤡🤡🤡
https://t.co/6TqORZbbnl
@GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay Vanities… blind people …its no longer science or evidence..
@DrKatEpi @GYamey @BlockedByVinay The Prasad is losing the Pra and just becoming sad
@GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay He blocks physicians but not antivaxxers. Wonder why that is 🧐
@babydocAnita @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay It looks like he blocked a LOT of physicians yesterday!

@GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay Respect for their professional opinions grows smaller by their own choosing.... and the more colleagues they block,  it becomes more difficult to reverse. Their World shrinks each time.

@GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay I hope you have complained to the California Medical Board and to Prasad's department head, @Bob_Wachter, about his professional misconduct (by promulgating dangerous disinformation).

@GYamey @medpagetoday @BlockedByVinay It’s always revealing when twitter pundits surrounded by a constellation of awful people do nothing to put a stop to that sort of behaviour. I would be mortified if anyone tried to defend me in an unpleasant manner
